actions.committee: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to repeal the requirements that the amount of U.S. notes outstanding at any time remain fixed.

summary.text: Removes the requirement that the U.S. Treasury issue additional United States notes to replace United States notes which are retired.

titles.title: A bill to repeal the requirements that the amount of U.S. notes outstanding at any time remain fixed.
